tooltip.vanillatech.desc.hammer: §7To craft it into a plate, drop any ingot and use a hammer on it§f
tooltip.vanillatech.desc.silicon_ingot: §7Pressing it with a hammer makes it into a silicon wafer.§f
tooltip.vanillatech.desc.silicon_wafer: §7This can be processed to make chips.§f
tooltip.vanillatech.desc.precision_silic: §7A precisely manufactured silicon wafer used to create advanced circuits.§f
tooltip.vanillatech.desc.slag: §7Slag produced when metals are smelted in an arc furnace.§f
tooltip.vanillatech.desc.electrode: §7An electrode made of carbon for use in inserts in electric arc furnaces§f
gui.vanillatech.arc_furnace.title: Arc Furnace
gui.vanillatech.boiler.title: Boiler
